titles: A health to the gentlemanly profession of seruingmen; or, The seruingmans comforts With other thinges not impertinent to the premisses, as well pleasant as profitable to the courteous reader.
author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637, attributed name.

notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: England --  Social life and customs --  Early works to 1800.
